name: L-methionine:oxidized-thioredoxin S-oxidoreductase
definition: L-Methionine + Thioredoxin disulfide + H2O <=> L-Methionine S-oxide + Thioredoxin
comment: two distinct enzymes L-methionine (S)-S-oxide specific (ec 1.8.4.13, see R07606) L-methionine (R)-S-oxide specific (ec 1.8.4.14, see R07608)
